name: Teddy?
description:
An horror survival game about a kid seeking for his teddy and his parents during a long night, alone at home.

The game has been developed during the Global Game Jam 2019 @ Polimi, Milan, Italy.

Credits to other team members who shared this experience with me:

  •  Guido Gerosa
  • Filipppo Gerosa
  • Elisabetta Poli

Also, ALLOT of kudos to our mates from the Audio HelpDesk, who made music for our games and sound effects:

  •  Daniele Mortarino for the main Music
  • Andrea Carsenzuola for the SFX
